FuncDef: The display ospfv3 command displays brief information of OSPFv3. The display ospfv3 command displays brief information of OSPFv3. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an OSPFv3 process ID. If no process ID is specified, the brief information of all OSPFv3 processes is displayed in the ascending order of the process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Examples: SPF Intelligent Timer[millisecs] Max: 10000, Start: 500, Hold: 1000
LSA Originate Intelligent Timer[millisecs] Max: 5000, Start: 500, Hold: 1000
LSA Arrival Intelligent Timer[millisecs] Max: 1000, Start: 500, Hold: 500
